name: CannonSatan
description:
https://itch.io/jam/christmassive

Christmassive Game Jam game created by:
Hippopotaska, Krambu, Wolfdeth, Quantion, Cudl & Eidzei

Visit the houses of Naughties as the brave Cannon Satan and annihilate them within the time limit!

Controls:

  • WASD = Move
  • Space = Launch (Cannon), Turn towards camera direction during flight.
  • Esc = Return to Main Menu
  • ALT+F4 = Exit game
